name: asserter
description: A tiny assertion lib for both nodejs and the browser.

scripts.lint: if test "$(type eslint)"; then eslint test.js; fi
scripts.dist: if test "$(type uglifyjs)"; then uglifyjs asserter.js > asserter.min.js; fi
scripts.docs: if test "$(type jsdoc)"; then jsdoc asserter.js -d docs; fi
scripts.cover: if test "$(type jasmine && type istanbul)"; then istanbul cover jasmine spec.js; fi

author: Luis Leiva
